Posts.Content: this site is for those of us who are battling cancer   are you? or are you selling wigs?  i have a gorgeous artificial wig which looks better than my old human hair but i would never promote my wonderful wig maker here -- someone who has done big tv and movie stars   what are your aims here?
Posts.Title: wig-ged out!

Posts.Content: btw ladies ACS or Cancer Care - can't remember which has a give away of donated wigs every year   there's an upper east side wig maker who donates to them and i was able to get a wig from them for nothing    now that i've decided to wear one full time due to age related thinning of my hair i spent $600 on a wonderful artificial that looks better than the real ones do and is easier to care for  my point earlier is that i thought we do not use this site for commercial use by non cancer or caretaker members if this is going to be a commercial space, count me out CC please!
